name: Neko Office: Nightlife Adventures
description:
Neko has been working hard at her job in the office and deserves to go to the bar! As you know, it is from the bar that nightly adventures begin...

Easy win:
Keyboard Сtrl+D - Complete Level


FEATURES

  • 💼 Beautiful artwork
  • 📌 Animation scenes
  • 📋 Relaxing music
  • 🗃️ CG Gallery Mode
  • 📈 Puzzle game

    In the game, your goal is to collect pares in order to restore the pictures.
